title: Covid Vaccines
author: Patrickj
description: I understand that it's not healthy to live with regret. But I can't get over my regret of having 2 x Covid jabs. Really struggling with this worry and...
cleaned_text: - Our TMS drop-in chat is today (Saturday) from 3:00 PM - 4:00 PM Eastern U.S.(New York) Daylight Time. It's a great way to get quick and interactive peer support. Enrique is today's host. Click here for more info or just look for the red flag on the menu bar at 3pm Eastern (now US Daylight Time).
